summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HFT Bot wallet integration. Backend wallet functionality working correctly with real Solana RPC calls. Frontend wallet panels and controls functioning properly. Bot operations remain stable with wallet integration.

minor_bugs.issue: WebSocket connection fails due to timeout parameter issue
minor_bugs.impact: Real-time updates may not work via WebSocket

design_issues.issue: Wallet address not consistently displayed in sidebar

passed_tests: POST /api/wallet/encrypt - derives correct Solana address from keypair
POST /api/wallet/unlock - unlocks with correct passphrase and returns address
GET /api/wallet/status - returns proper is_setup, is_unlocked, address fields
GET /api/wallet/balance/{address} - fetches real SOL balance and tokens via Helius RPC
GET /api/wallet/balance - returns configured wallet balance correctly
Frontend Setup page shows wallet encryption form with private key + passphrase fields
Frontend Setup page shows Reset Wallet button when wallet is configured
Frontend Control page shows Backend Wallet (HFT) panel with balance display
Frontend Control page shows Phantom Wallet (Display) panel with connect button
Bot start/stop functionality works after wallet integration
All existing API endpoints still work (GET /api/config, POST /api/bot/start, GET /api/positions)
Error handling for invalid private keys works correctly
